marklogic.body: kikiki meles may be smart for you but not for real Ethiopian,do you know why? meles fight with war lords in somalia and he bood sucker for 30,000 innocent ethiopian for white men benefit.ethiopian girl hanging her self infornt of meles emabasy.meles exporting 450000 girls to arab country,meles selling fertile land ethiopia in gamblia,amahara,..etc,meles killed 200 civil people in street, yanne sewa Burn him self because meles rules.meles divided Ethiopian like aparthid (south africa).meles asked food aid for ethiopia in 21 century,so where is your development now?Ethiopian sold for arabs,you don't have country any more,you are under modern colony,please don't compare to Eritrea president,there is 22 foreign countries doing business for minig sector,gas and there is exploring oil too,but I don't think so you know. this is Secret for you,there is rail road connected massaw, asmara to sudan under construction.Eritrea is better in health care in africa,because we have alot medical school.Eritrea economy passed double dig meles economy with food aid.if you want go head search eritrea and ethiopia economy 2011 in google.afaworki not taking food aid like meles in africa,and also you need to go star bucks,you will see ethi-water for donation,you don't drink even clean water under meles rule in 21 century.shame on you compare Eritrea with Ethiopia,Eritrea is 20 years country,if you have mind but Eritrea doing better. lol long live Eritrea president.
